learning_objectives: Write a simple Java program to print 'Hello World',Declare and initialize variables in Java

learning_objectives: Perform arithmetic operations using different operators,Use increment and decrement operators

learning_objectives: Write programs using if-else statements,Use switch-case statements for decision making
problem_task_completed: Implemented conditional logic to determine grade categories.,Used switch-case statements to handle different grading criteria.

learning_objectives: Write programs using for loops,Use while and do-while loops
problem_task_completed: Used for loops to iterate through student records.,Applied while and do-while loops for repeated grade calculations.

problem_task_completed: Defined and called functions to modularize the grade calculation.,Passed arguments and returned values in functions to handle different student data.

learning_objectives: Implement try-catch blocks,Use finally block for cleanup operations
